content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for "Brno Reservoir Trail hiking" and found websites with trail guides and reviews. I then used the "browse_website" command to gather information on the distance and difficulty level of the trail, but encountered an error. I attempted to execute a Python script to gather more information by writing it to a file named "brno_reservoir_trail.py". The script used the requests and BeautifulSoup libraries to scrape the trail distance and difficulty level from the website "https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada". The "write_to_file" command successfully wrote the file.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "packing_list.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Packing List for Brno Reservoir Trail:
- Hiking boots
- Water bottle
- Snacks
- Sunscreen
- Insect repellent
- First aid kit
- Map
- Compass
- Hat
- Sunglasses
- Extra clothing
- Rain gear
- Headlamp or flashlight
- Emergency whistle
- Multi-tool or knife
- Cash or credit card', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "curl wttr.in/Brno"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command execute_shell returned too much output. b'Filesystem      Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on\noverlay         3.7T  900G  2.9T  24% /\ntmpfs            64M     0   64M   0% /dev\ntmpfs            32G     0   32G   0% /sys/fs/cgroup\nshm              64M     0   64M   0% /dev/shm\n/dev/md0        3.7T  900G  2.9T  24% /etc/hosts\ntmpfs            32G     0   32G   0% /proc/asound\ntmpfs            32G     0   32G   0% /proc/acpi\ntmpfs            32G     0   32G   0% /proc/scsi\ntmpfs            32G     0   32G   0% /sys/firmware\n'
